item.title: Fixed/Variable-length encoding in Go
item.description: This post covers how to use the standard encoding/binary package to encode binary according to a custom format, and how it works.

item.title: Understanding how AES encryption works
item.description: I recently had the opportunity to encrypt/decrypt stuff using AES, but I didn’t know it inside out well. I couldnâ€™t help but be curious about how it is working, and I realized my mind could only be satisfied by digging deeper into its implementation.
